scripts.start:dev: cross-env TARGET=./src/index.tsx webpack serve --open index.html --config webpack.config.js
scripts.start:test: cross-env TARGET=./src/test.tsx webpack serve --open index.html --config webpack.config.js
scripts.build: cross-env TARGET=./src/index.tsx webpack --config webpack.config.js && npm run create-output-directory && cd dist && cat index.html | inliner > ../out/index.html
